short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save links with custom notes to your Half Bite collection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Half Bite Chrome extension gives you a frictionless way to save links along with your own thoughts as you encounter interesting things around the web.

Half Bite then makes it quick & easy to find and copy/paste those links along with your associated notes into your blog posts, social media feeds, and other places you publish content.
